articles.title: Nitish Kumar's Party Attacks BJP, Tension Scales Up In Alliance
articles.description: Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar has called a meeting of all Janata Dal (United) MLAs and MPs on Tuesday, leading to speculation his growing friction with the BJP may come to a head.

articles.title: Driven by ‘ex-Madhya Pradesh MLA’, speeding car rams into vehicles in Delhi
articles.description: The speeding vehicle first crashed into a WagonR car, which hit one scooty, the police said, adding that the driver of WagonR and the scooty riders suffered minor injuries. | Latest News Delhi
articles.content: A speeding BMW car late on Saturday night rammed into several vehicles in north Delhis Geeta Colony area around 10.45 pm, damaging many two-wheelers and four-wheelers. The car was allegedly being dri… [+1785 chars]

articles.author: Anonna Dutt
articles.title: Satellites ‘no longer usable’ as ISRO’s first SSLV launch develops glitch
articles.description: While the three solid fuel-based propulsion stages worked normally, the satellites were injected into a wrong orbit, due to failure of logic to identify a sensor failure.
articles.content: The maiden flight of ISROs newly developed Small Satellite Launch Vehicle (SSLV) suffered a setback on Sunday, with data loss at the terminal stage, after three stages had performed and separated as … [+4145 chars]

articles.title: As PM Modi lauds states, here’s what chief ministers said at Niti Aayog meet
articles.description: At the Niti Aayog meet on Sunday, PM Modi lauded the state governments in overcoming challenges with resilience. Meanwhile, chief ministers of some non-BJP ruled states took the opportunity to present their demands and grievances before the government.
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi chaired the seventh meeting of the Governing Council (GC) of NITI Aayog on Sunday. PM Modi lauded the collective efforts of all the states in the spirit of cooperative fe… [+5481 chars]

articles.title: Ashamed, says MP as 6 men look for Noida woman assaulted by ‘BJP leader’
articles.description: On Sunday, atleast 6 men entered the Grand Omaxe society in Noida and allegedly started asking about the address of the woman who was mishandled by Shrikant Tyagi.

articles.title: Taiwan Is Chinese Territory, Not A Part Of US: China
articles.description: Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi said on Sunday that Taiwan is not part of the United States but Chinese territory, in the latest diplomatic invective against US policy.
articles.content:
The United States has been engaging in "sophistry" on the Taiwan question, China said.

articles.title: Supreme Court needs to end uncertainty on Article 370 now
